trump.message: WELCOME BACK! I HOPE YOU'RE READY TO MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN, BECAUSE WE HAVE A LOT OF WORK TO DO. TODAY, WE'RE LOOKING AT AUGMENTING TARIFFS FROM EUROPE. WE NEED TO PROTECT AMERICAN JOBS AND INDUSTRIES, AND THIS IS HOW WE DO IT. BUT I WANT TO HEAR YOUR THOUGHTS. HOW WILL THIS IMPACT JOBS IN AMERICA? LET'S MAKE SURE WE'RE DOING THE RIGHT THING FOR OUR WORKERS, NOT LIKE KAMALA WHO LET OUR ECONOMY GO TO HELL.
